definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a precious stone which Tyre gained by trade Ez Eze 27:16 (where ´[[נ]] doubted by Berthol, queried by Toy: Hpt), cf. Eze 28:13 (symbol. of wealth and honour of king of Tyre); in high priest's breastplate Ex 28:18, Ex 39:11. Perh. = ruby or carbuncle LXX Joseph. a)/nqrac, Vulgate carbunculus, cf. Di:Ex Kau:Ex Sgfr:Ezek Co Berthol; Targum AV emerald.
